title: Ticket #1470: Fix documentation of default universe
description:
I'm reporting this problem on behalf of Paolo Mazzanti.

Paolo was surprised when the default universe for a job changed. (Really, that's an iffy thing to be changing, if you ask me.) I know it's not a recent change, but he wasn't dealing much with Condor for a while.

One reason that he was surprised was that the manual is incorrect. Section 2.4.1 "Choosing a Condor Universe" says:

http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.4/2_4Road_map_Running.html#sec:Choosing-Universe

  The universe under which a job runs is specified in the submit description file. If a universe is not specified, the default is standard.

I'd like to make two recommendations:

1) Change the default to "vanilla, unless your Condor administrator has changed the default".

2) Add a sentence, something like "However, we strongly encourage you to specify the universe since the default can be changed by your Condor administrator, and the default that ships with Condor has changed." You can wordsmith that, but hopefully that gives you the idea.

Thanks!
